keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By EMMARIE HUETTEMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: As lawmakers considered the annual Pentagon budget, Democrats said they opposed Republican efforts to keep military funding insulated.

headline.print_headline: Democrats Balk at Sparing Only Military Spending From Mandated Cuts
headline.main: Democrats Balk at Sparing Only Military Spending From Mandated Cuts

snippet: As lawmakers considered the annual Pentagon budget, Democrats said they opposed Republican efforts to keep military funding insulated.
abstract: Democrats oppose amendments to National Defense Authorization Act, citing Republican effort to dedicate $39 billion toward emergency military fund that is insulated from spending cuts; argue that Pentagon budget should not be immune from spending cuts.
